zh: 说实话，我一点也不喜欢辣薯片。

en: Despite common misconceptions, data collected after a decade of professional research on the fandom shows that furries are no more likely to be "attracted" to animals than the general population.
zh: 尽管存在常见的误解，但对该圈子进行了长达十年的专业研究后收集的数据表明，毛茸茸对动物的“吸引力”并不比普通人群高。

en: I asked him but he didn't respond.
zh: 我问了他，但他没有回应。

en: She's a very famous person.
zh: 她是个非常有名的人。

en: She's very famous.
zh: 她非常有名。

en: Tom's voice sounds like a kid's.
zh: 汤姆的声音听起来像个孩子。

en: Tom, it's me. Can I talk with you?
zh: 汤姆，是我。我可以和你谈谈吗？

en: Tom, it's me. Can we talk?
zh: 汤姆，是我。我们可以谈谈吗？

en: Tom can't tie his own tie.
zh: 汤姆不会自己打领带。

en: "Does this work?" "No, it won't fit."
zh: “这个行吗？” “不行，尺寸不合适。”

en: Tom and Mary live together, even though they're just friends.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽住在一起，即使他们只是朋友。

en: "Welcome home. The bath is ready for you." "I'm feeling hungry, so is it ok if I eat something beforehand?" "No, don't touch a thing! Get to the bathroom." "Hey, you don't have to treat me like a germ you know." "But do you think I can help it with the current state of the world? Please hurry up. Oh, and don't forget to leave the window open after you get out of the bath."
zh: “欢迎回家。洗澡水已经准备好了。” “我感觉饿了，我可以先吃点东西吗？” “不行，什么都别碰！去浴室。” “嘿，你没必要像对待细菌一样对待我吧。” “但是你觉得在现在这种世界局势下，我能控制得了吗？请快点。哦，还有，洗完澡后别忘了开窗户。”

en: I only have a few pencils.
zh: 我只有几支铅笔。

en: Tom Jackson lives on Park Street in Boston, Australia with his wife Mary, three children, and pet dog Cookie. He speaks French, is 30 years old, and celebrates his birthday on October the 20th.
zh: 汤姆·杰克逊和他的妻子玛丽、三个孩子以及宠物狗库奇住在澳大利亚波士顿的公园街。 他会说法语，今年30岁，他的生日是10月20日。

en: I saw Sami at the airport.
zh: 我在机场看到了萨米。

en: Apparently we can find Japanese speaking tanukis, koalas, foxes and rabbits here?
zh: 据说我们可以在这里找到会说日语的狸、考拉、狐狸和兔子？

en: The laundry isn't dry yet.
zh: 洗的衣服还没干。

en: Don't forget to get your vaccinations.
zh: 别忘了去接种疫苗。

en: Yes, my insurance covers tow service.
zh: 是的，我的保险包括拖车服务。

en: My brother was a furry, too.
zh: 我哥哥也曾经是个兽迷。

en: I don't like these shoes either.
zh: 我也不喜欢这双鞋。

en: Don't eat bacon at night because it has a lot of fat.
zh: 晚上不要吃培根，因为它有很多脂肪。

en: Tom was the one who cooked breakfast.
zh: 是汤姆做的早餐。

en: Tom cut his own hair.
zh: 汤姆自己剪了头发。

en: A single person lives in this ample abode?
zh: 这间宽敞的住所里只住了一个人吗？

en: Why's everyone laughing?
zh: 大家都在笑什么？

en: Why's everybody laughing?
zh: 大家都在笑什么？

en: Let's never grow up.
zh: 让我们永远不要长大。

en: How often do you eat pudding?
zh: 你多久吃一次布丁？

en: It is still moving.
zh: 它还在移动。

en: Let's assume that it's true.
zh: 我们假设它是真的。

en: Let's assume it's true.
zh: 我们假设它是真的。

en: Why were you late for school this morning?
zh: 你今天早上为什么上学迟到？

en: It's warmer than usual tonight.
zh: 今晚比平常暖和。

en: Go scrub the bathtub.
zh: 去刷浴缸。

en: Does this car use regular or premium?
zh: 这辆车用普通汽油还是高级汽油？

en: Is the fuel tank opening on this car on the right or on the left?
zh: 这辆车的油箱盖在右边还是左边？

en: Isn't it hard to park while looking at the Around View Monitor?
zh: 看着全景监控停车是不是很难？

en: Let's eat, drink, and be merry.
zh: 让我们吃喝玩乐吧。

en: Diet drinks taste terrible.
zh: 无糖饮料味道很糟糕。

en: Tom often drinks green tea.
zh: 汤姆经常喝绿茶。

en: Helping others is never a waste of time.
zh: 帮助别人永远不会浪费时间。

en: What is GNP an abbreviation for?
zh: GNP是哪个词的缩写？

en: It has stopped getting colder already, so it is best to swap studded tyre's to normal tyres.
zh: 已经不再变冷了，所以最好把防滑轮胎换成普通轮胎。

en: Tom welcomed Mary with open arms.
zh: 汤姆热情地欢迎了玛丽。

en: Tom slowly opened the gift that Mary had given him.
zh: 汤姆慢慢地打开了玛丽送给他的礼物。

en: Why did Tom leave the door open?
zh: 汤姆为什么不关门？

en: I'd like to open a restaurant in this neighborhood someday.
zh: 我想有一天在这个社区开一家餐馆。

en: This event isn't open to the public.
zh: 这个活动不对公众开放。

en: Tom left his door open.
zh: 汤姆没关门。

en: Please wait in the waiting room.
zh: 请在等候室等候。

en: Tom came out to his parents as a furry.
zh: 汤姆向他的父母坦白自己是个兽迷。

en: This road is unpaved and uneven.
zh: 这条路没有铺路，而且不平整。

en: Tom was evicted by his landlord for not paying rent.
zh: 汤姆因为不交房租被房东赶走了。

en: Tom is my right-hand man. I can really count on him.
zh: 汤姆是我的得力助手。我真的可以依靠他。

en: Whilst on my way to school, I happened to catch sight of my uncle.
zh: 在上学的路上，我碰巧看到了我的叔叔。

en: Thank you for your words of appreciation.
zh: 谢谢你的赞赏。

en: My head is really itchy.
zh: 我的头真痒。

en: If possible, I'd like to see Tom.
zh: 如果可以的话，我想见见汤姆。
